text:
Mary Elizabeth Winstead (born November 28, 1984) is an American motion picture and television actress. She is known for roles in many feature films, with horror movies and sequels to "Die Hard". Her recent TV roles include the comedy series "BrainDead" (2016), medical drama "Mercy Street" (2016-17), and black comedy "Fargo" (2017).
She played Jessica in the soap opera "Passions" (1999-2000). She played Lucy McClane in "Live Free or Die Hard" (2007). She also played the scream queen in many horror pictures, including "Black Christmas" and "Final Destination 3".
In 2020, she will star as Huntress in "Birds of Prey".
Winstead was born in Rocky Mount, North Carolina. She was raised in Utah.
